meanings.sent1: The mechanic's hands were the oiliest after working on the car.
meanings.sent2: The pizza from that restaurant is always the oiliest.
meanings.sent3: The salad dressing was so oiliest that it seemed to have its own personality.
meanings.sent4: The rain made the road look like the oiliest painting.
meanings.sent5: The oiliest frying pan was difficult to clean.

meanings.definition: Excessively flattering or ingratiating in manner.
meanings.sent1: She gave the oiliest compliments to her boss to get a promotion.
meanings.sent2: The salesman's oiliest smile couldn't hide his true intentions.
meanings.sent3: His oiliest behavior at the party made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The politician's speech was the oiliest attempt to win over the crowd.
meanings.sent5: Her oiliest charm always seemed insincere.
